title: E-what
content:
“About Our Band”
The Zhongwu Chisha (What to Eat for Lunch) band, also known as Eat-What band or EW for short, is a band comprised of 22 nd-grade students. We have a diverse selection of songs and our music style is still evolving. Our goal is to bring joy to everyone through music (and possibly other means). Initially, we named ourselves after the Beijing roast duck, but now our answer to the question of what to eat for lunch is: why not try a 驴肉火烧?

title: Hello World
content:
Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub.
Quick StartCreate a new post$ hexo new "My New Post"

More info: Writing
Run server$ hexo server

More info: Server
Generate static files$ hexo generate

More info: Generating
Deploy to remote sites$ hexo deploy

More info: Deployment
